mapper.select: SELECT TPO.post_no ,TPO.member_no ,TPO.content ,TPO.createdt ,TPO.like_cnt ,TMB.login_id AS login_id , (SELECT count(*) FROM dbo.comment AS TCO WHERE TCO.post_no = TPO.post_no ) AS comment_cnt , (SELECT TME.filename FROM dbo.media AS TME WHERE TME.media_no = TPO.media_no ) AS filename FROM dbo.post AS TPO INNER JOIN dbo.member AS TMB ON TPO.member_no = TMB.member_no;
SELECT post_no , member_no , media_no , content , createdt FROM instagram.dbo.post WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
SELECT P.post_no, M.filename FROM dbo.post P, dbo.media M WHERE P.media_no = M.media_no and P.member_no = #{memberNo}
